      public static int userInput(int i, int j)
      Function to get the user choice. Makes sure the choice does not have any error. Makes sure the choice is with the range of choices.
      Parameters:
      i - Value of the lowest choice.
      j - Value of the highest choice.
      Returns:
      Choice of the user.
